Properties.Description: Saves given password to parameter store as SecureString

Fn::Join: if 'Password' not in event['ResourceProperties'] or not event['ResourceProperties']['Password']:
print 'The property Password must not be empty'
print 'The store parameter has been created. Id='+physicalResourceId
return cfnresponse.send(event, context, cfnresponse.SUCCESS, response, physicalResourceId)

Properties.Description: Copy files from foreign region to local region

04-CheckDRServiceStatus.command: powershell.exe -Command " if ((Get-Service 'CyberArk Vault Disaster Recovery').Status -eq 'Running') {exit 0} else {exit 1} "

04-CPMScannerServiceConfig.command: sc config "CyberArk Central Policy Manager Scanner" start=auto

06-CPMScannerServiceStart.command: sc start "CyberArk Central Policy Manager Scanner"

12-PSMServiceConfig.command: sc config "Cyber-Ark Privileged Session Manager" start=auto

EULA.Description: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions.

KeyName.Description: Select an existing Key Pair from your AWS account.

VaultFilesBucket.Description: Enter the name of the bucket containing the license and recovery public key.

LicenseFile.Description: Enter the path of the license file within the bucket.

RecoveryPublicKey.Description: Enter the path of the recovery public key file within the bucket.

VaultInstanceName.Description: Enter a name for the Vault instance.

VaultMasterPassword.Description: Enter a password for the Vault Master user.
VaultMasterPassword.ConstraintDescription: Vault Master password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character

RetypeMasterPassword.Description: Retype the password for the Vault Master user.

VaultAdminPassword.Description: Enter a password for the Vault Administrator user.
VaultAdminPassword.ConstraintDescription: Vault Administrator password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character

RetypeAdminPassword.Description: Retype the password for the Vault Administrator user.

VaultDRPassword.Description: Enter a password for the Vault DR user.
VaultDRPassword.ConstraintDescription: Vault DR password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit and 1 special character

RetypeDRPassword.Description: Retype the password for the Vault DR user.

VaultInstanceType.Description: Select the instance type of the Vault instances.

VaultInstanceSecurityGroups.Description: Assign Security Groups to the Vault and Vault DR instances.

VaultInstanceSubnetId.Description: Select the Subnet Id where the Vault instance will reside.

DRInstanceSubnetId.Description: Select the Subnet Id where the Vault DR instance will reside.

ComponentsInstanceName.Description: Enter a name for the PAS Components instance.

ComponentsInstanceType.Description: Select the instance type of the PAS Components instance.

ComponentsInstanceSecurityGroups.Description: Assign Security Groups to the PAS Components instance.

ComponentsInstanceSubnetId.Description: Select the Subnet Id where the PAS Components instance will reside.

CloudWatchLogGroupName.Description: The name of the CloudWatch log group
